communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Michigan Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

All resisting and obstructing (R&O) incident reports and related materials involving officer Zachary Bennett.

For each R&O‑related incident involving the above officers, please provide:
All incidents reports including
Officer narratives 
Officer names
Date, time, and location
All charges
All related documents
Any internal summaries or case notes associated with the incident
Body-worn camera footage
All body‑worn camera footage recorded by the listed officers
All body‑worn camera footage recorded by any other officer present
Any audio recordings associated with the incident
Dispatch Records
911 call audio (if applicable)
Dispatch notes or timestamps

The time frame for all requests is January 1, 2023 to December 31, 2025.

I am requesting these records in my capacity as a journalist investigating matters of significant public interest regarding Resisting and Obstructing charges in Kalamazoo County. The requested documents will contribute to public understanding of the charge and the way they are issued.
For records originating or only existing in digital form, I respectfully request these records be provided in their native electronic formats that preserve all metadata. Specifically:
Body‑cam and footage: original video files
Emails: .eml or .msg
Documents: .docx, .xlsx, .pdf (searchable)

Please deliver these electronic records to the email address listed below. If file size limitations prevent email delivery, I am willing to accept records via a secure file transfer method of your choosing or provide a storage device, if necessary.

If the documents I have requested are not disclosable in their entirety, I request that you release all nonexempt portions of the documents after separating them from the portions you deem exempt. With respect to documents or portions of documents that are exempt, please state with particularity the specific legal and factual basis justifying each exemption, as well as the nature of information being withheld. See MCL 15.235(5)(a)-(c); MCL 15.244. This includes identifying those records that are being withheld in their entirety. See Herald Co, Inc v Ann Arbor Public Schools, 224 Mich App 266, 275 (1997).

If no responsive documents exist for a particular portion of this request, please clearly identify which portions of this request have been denied for that reason, rather than providing a general statement of non-existence.
If you determine that any portion of my request is exempt because it contains information you deem privileged or deliberative, please identify the specific privileged information with particularity and provide the factual basis for the deliberative process claim.

Pursuant to MCL 15.234(2), I request a waiver or reduction of fees as this request is made by a representative of the news media and the requested information is in the public interest because it contributes significantly to the public's understanding of the operations or activities of the government and is not primarily in the commercial interest of the requester. If you do not grant this fee waiver, please contact me before processing if the total cost will exceed $500.00.

Please note that willful failure to comply with a FOIA request is grounds for civil fines, and legal fees and costs may be awarded to a plaintiff who prevails in a FOIA case, especially where the public body has acted arbitrarily and capriciously in denying the FOIA request. See MCL 15.240(6).

I appreciate your assistance in processing this request in a timely manner as required by law. If you need any clarification or have any questions about this request, please contact me immediately at coriosterman@nowkalamazoo.org.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Cori Osterman

Please note that willful failure to comply with a FOIA request is grounds for civil fines, and legal fees and costs may be awarded to a plaintiff who prevails in a FOIA case, especially where the public body has acted arbitrarily and capriciously in denying the FOIA request. See MCL 15.240(6).

I appreciate your assistance in processing this request in a timely manner as required by law. If you need any clarification or have any questions about this request, please contact me immediately at coriosterman@nowkalamazoo.org.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Cori Osterman

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Michigan Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

All resisting and obstructing (R&O) incident reports and related materials involving officer Miller, Michael.

For each R&O‑related incident involving the above officers, please provide:
All incidents reports including
Officer narratives 
Officer names
Date, time, and location
All charges
All related documents
Any internal summaries or case notes associated with the incident
Body-worn camera footage
All body‑worn camera footage recorded by the listed officers
All body‑worn camera footage recorded by any other officer present
Any audio recordings associated with the incident
Dispatch Records
911 call audio (if applicable)
Dispatch notes or timestamps

The time frame for all requests is January 1, 2023 to December 31, 2025.

I am requesting these records in my capacity as a journalist investigating matters of significant public interest regarding Resisting and Obstructing charges in Kalamazoo County. The requested documents will contribute to public understanding of the charge and the way they are issued.
For records originating or only existing in digital form, I respectfully request these records be provided in their native electronic formats that preserve all metadata. Specifically:
Body‑cam and footage: original video files
Emails: .eml or .msg
Documents: .docx, .xlsx, .pdf (searchable)

Please deliver these electronic records to the email address listed below. If file size limitations prevent email delivery, I am willing to accept records via a secure file transfer method of your choosing or provide a storage device, if necessary.

If the documents I have requested are not disclosable in their entirety, I request that you release all nonexempt portions of the documents after separating them from the portions you deem exempt. With respect to documents or portions of documents that are exempt, please state with particularity the specific legal and factual basis justifying each exemption, as well as the nature of information being withheld. See MCL 15.235(5)(a)-(c); MCL 15.244. This includes identifying those records that are being withheld in their entirety. See Herald Co, Inc v Ann Arbor Public Schools, 224 Mich App 266, 275 (1997).

If no responsive documents exist for a particular portion of this request, please clearly identify which portions of this request have been denied for that reason, rather than providing a general statement of non-existence.
If you determine that any portion of my request is exempt because it contains information you deem privileged or deliberative, please identify the specific privileged information with particularity and provide the factual basis for the deliberative process claim.

If you do not grant this fee waiver, please contact me before processing if the total cost will exceed $500.00.

Please note that willful failure to comply with a FOIA request is grounds for civil fines, and legal fees and costs may be awarded to a plaintiff who prevails in a FOIA case, especially where the public body has acted arbitrarily and capriciously in denying the FOIA request. See MCL 15.240(6).

I appreciate your assistance in processing this request in a timely manner as required by law. If you need any clarification or have any questions about this request, please contact me immediately at coriosterman@nowkalamazoo.org.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Sincerely,

Cori Osterman
